title: The War with Mr. Wizzle
description: Bruno and Boots can't stand Mr. Wizzle, the new faculty member. He believes in demerits, computers, and a dress code. Mr. Wizzle is ruining Macdonald Hall. So Bruno and Boots, their friends, and the girls of Miss Scrimmage's Finishing School have decided to team up and get rid of him.NOTE: This title has been republished as The Wizzle War.
author: Gordon Korman
